ygData.subject: Re: Limit on song memorization
ygData.msgSnippet: You misunderstand -- he s saying that people stack Chant of Battle with Celerity because Celerity won t stack with Anthem de Arms. -- Sharon
ygData.messageBody:
You misunderstand -- he's saying that people stack Chant of Battle with
Celerity because Celerity won't stack with Anthem de Arms.

-- Sharon
----------
>From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Limit on song memorization
>Date: Mon, Aug 2, 1999, 7:02 AM
>

>From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
>
>I dont know what your problem is, but your sarcasm at my question was
>uncalled for. Not to mention that I didn't say a thing about whether Chant
>could stack with Celerity. I asked if Celerity stacked with Anthem and if
>so, WHY someone would stack Celerity and Chant.
>
>> Yes, the reason why ppl stack Chant of Battle with
>> Celerity is because it won't stack.
